SEARCH
Package com.kukrisports.movie.catalogue.service

Interface DirectorService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectorServiceImpl
public interface DirectorService
Service interface for managing movie directors.

This interface defines operations related to the creation, updating, deletion, and retrieval of movie directors. Directors are represented by the Director model, which contains information such as name, birthdate, and biography.

The service layer interacts with the underlying repository or database to perform these operations.

  • Method Details

    • createDirector

      Director createDirector(Director director)
      Creates a new director.

      This method persists a new director in the system with the provided details.

      Parameters:
      director - the Director object containing the director's details
      Returns:
      the created Director object with its generated ID

    • updateDirector

      Director updateDirector(UUID directorId, Director director)
      Updates an existing director.

      This method updates the details of an existing director in the system using the provided director ID.

      Parameters:
      directorId - the ID of the director to update
      director - the Director object containing the updated director details
      Returns:
      the updated Director object

    • deleteDirector

      void deleteDirector(UUID id)
      Deletes a director by their ID.

      This method removes a director from the system based on the provided director ID.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the director to delete

    • getDirectorById

      Director getDirectorById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a director by their ID.

      This method fetches a director from the system using their unique identifier.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the director to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Director object representing the director, or null if not found

    • getAllDirectors

      List<Director> getAllDirectors()
      Retrieves all directors.

      This method fetches all directors from the system.

      Returns:
      a list of all Director objects
